Title: Yellow Submarine
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Writer: Lee Minoff (original story), John Lennon (based upon a song by), Paul McCartney (based upon a song by), Lee Minoff (screenplay), Al Brodax (screenplay), Jack Mendelsohn (screenplay), Erich Segal (screenplay)
Actors: The Beatles, Paul Angelis, John Clive, Dick Emery
Plot: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred (Lance Percival) in his Yellow Submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music hating Blue Meanies.
